hierarchy.entry_domain: Backup and Recovery for Information Assets

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group debate, argue whether tape backup systems remain viable in 2024 compared to cloud solutions, citing NIST SP 800-88 sanitization challenges (e.g., degaussing feasibility for high-coercivity LTO tapes vs. cloud encryption), data remanence risks, costs, and real-world ransomware recovery case studies.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Asset Security (Tape Backup Systems under Backup Storage and Media). Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Asset Security > Information and Asset Handling > Backup and Recovery > Backup Storage and Media > Tape Backup Systems. Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Learning Objectives: [Insert full learning_objectives array above] - Active Learning: Use scenarios from [discussion_prompt], [peer_teaching_activity], [problem_solving_exercise] for applied cards. - Scaffolding: Distribute cards across 4 layers [insert scaffolding array]. - Research Context: NIST SP 800-88r1/r2 (complete: stresses documenting sanitization processes including methods, personnel involved, dates/times, verification results; tape specifics: Degaussing for Purge if coercivity matched, Destroy via shredding/disintegration). Key terms: Tape backup, ISM, remanence, Clear/Purge/Destroy. Best practices: Offsite security, hybrid tape-cloud, ransomware recovery. Generate 25 high-quality flashcards following this exact schema [insert flashcard_schema.structure and rules]. Output ONLY in JSON: {'flashcards': [{ 'type': '...', 'front': '...', 'back': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': 1-4 }]}. Ensure completeness: Full NIST docs, case studies (e.g., tape ransomware wins), concept map ties. Voter consensus (72.9%): Prioritize pedagogy, problem-solving, integration.
